2025-06-09.content: On June 9, 2025, we released an updated version of API Gateway.

summary.title: API Gateway Update
summary.summary: An updated version of API Gateway was released on June 9, 2025.

2025-06-09.content:
With this release, the limit on the number of API gateways that can be created per region is increased to **50**.

For more information, see [Quotas and limits](https://cloud.google.com/api-gateway/docs/quotas)

summary.title: API Gateway limit increased
summary.summary: The limit for API gateways per region has been increased to 50.
